info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 11:41PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Kane, southwestern McHenry and southeastern Boone Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1141 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Belvidere, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds of 45 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Belvidere, Woodstock, Marengo, Poplar Grove, Hampshire, Union and Garden Prairie. Including the following interstate... I-90 between mile markers 23 and 42. This includes... Boone County Fairgrounds. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
